attachments.title: U.S. government issues warning on McDonald's recalled wearable devices
attachments.text: The recall of McDonald's first wearable device was serious enough to get the attention of a government agency.
attachments.fallback: Mashable: U.S. government issues warning on McDonald's recalled wearable devices

text: wow so is it something in the plastic that is causing an allergic reaction?
either it is something dumb and simple as the edges being rough, having burrs, flash, or predictably nefarious chinese plastic manufacturing
yeah thats what i was thinking, seems vague tho. Either way its sad and hopefully doesn't set some precedent not to do devices like this again
What brought down the Fitbit charge? Or flex or whatever
now i understand the FDA requirement to do bioburden tests on materials that make skin contact with patients
(I have experienced allergic skin reactions to dodgy jewelry in my childhood)
